Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Target Cube

Parameters.Name: pSrcDir
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source Directory (will default to error log path)

Parameters.Name: pSrcFile
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source File (will default to pCube_Export.csv )

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Dimension

Parameters.Name: pSrcEle
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source Element ( Only required if a Dimension is used.)

Parameters.Name: pTgtEle
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Element (Only required if Dimension is used.)

Parameters.Name: pTitleRows
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Number of Title Rows to Skip

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: AsciiOutput delimiter character (Default=comma, 2 or 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pQuote
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Quote (Accepts empty quote, 2 or 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pDecimalSeparator
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Decimal separator for conversion of number to string and string to number (default = '.' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pThousandSeparator
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Thousand separator for conversion of number to string and string to number (default = ',' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pCumulate
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Accumulate Amounts (0 = Overwrite values, 1 = Accumulate values)

Parameters.Name: pCubeLogging
Parameters.Prompt: Required: Cube Logging (0 = No transaction logging, 1 = Logging of transactions, 2 = Ignore Cube Logging - No Action Taken)

Parameters.Name: pSandbox
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: To use sandbox not base data enter the sandbox name (invalid name will result in process error)

Parameters.Name: pZeroFilter
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source file includes Zero out filter (0=No filter line in source file, 1=Ignore filter line, 2=Perform ZeroOut using filter line)

Parameters.Name: pMappingToNewDims
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED IF TARGET HAS DIMS NOT IN SOURCE: DimX¦InputElementForDimX & DimY¦InputElementForDimY (specify an N level element for each new dim)

Parameters.Name: pDimDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL. Delimiter for start of Dimension/Element set

Parameters.Name: pEleStartDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of element list

Parameters.Name: pEleDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between elements

Parameters.Name: pCharacterSet
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: The output character set (defaults to TM1CS_UTF8 if blank)

Parameters.Name: pFileDelete
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete the source file on conclusion of import (Boolean 1/0, default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pSkipInvalidRecords
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Skip records with invalid elements rather than creating error log
